snippet: Stung by the rejection of the Keystone XL pipeline project, TransCanada is said to be seeking a new way into the market.

byline.original: By LESLIE PICKER and IAN AUSTEN

lead_paragraph: Stung by the rejection of the Keystone XL pipeline project, TransCanada is said to be seeking a new way into the market.

headline.main: TransCanada Is Said to Show Interest in Buying Columbia Pipeline
headline.print_headline: TransCanada Is Said to Have Made Bid for Columbia Pipeline
